#summary Description of the TPJVersionInfo.CharSetCode property.

= !CharSetCode property =

*Project:* [VersionInformationComponent Version Information Component].

*Unit:* _PJVersionInfo_. 

*Class:* _[TPJVersionInfo TPJVersionInfo]_

{{{
property CharSetCode: WORD;
}}}

== Description ==

Read only property that returns the code of the character set used by the current translation.

If the current file has no version information then 0 is returned. To get a description of the character set use the _[TPJVersionInfoCharSet CharSet]_ property instead.

See the _charsetID_ section of the [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa381058 MSDN VERSIONINFO] topic for information about these codes.
